key.name: pressure-threshold
key.summary: Amount by which the cursor must be moved "below" the edge in order to trigger, in pixels.

key.name: fallback-timeout
key.summary: Time the cursor must be touching the edge in order to trigger. Only used if the display does not support pressure barriers.

key.name: edge-size
key.summary: Size of hot area of the edge, as a percentage of the display width.

key.name: min-log-level
key.summary: Log statements with a level below this value are not logged.

key.name: suppress-activation-when-button-held
key.summary: If set to true, then when a mouse button is held down don't activate the overview.

key.name: suppress-activation-when-fullscreen
key.summary: If set to true, it won't activate the overview if a fullscreen window is focused.

key.name: fallback-in-use
key.summary: Set by the extension, indicates whether or not the time-based activation fallback method is in use.
